com.yubico.bitcoin.api

Interface YkneoBitcoin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractYkneoBitcoin, YkneoBitcoinNfc, YkneoBitcoinPCSC, YkneoBitcoinSoft

    public interface YkneoBitcoin
    Interface to the ykneo-bitcoin applet running on a YubiKey NEO.

    Keys used are in the BIP 32 format. A single extended key pair is stored on the YubiKey NEO, which is used to derive sub keys used for signing.

    Though BIP 32 supports a tree hierarchy of keys, ykneo-bitcoin only supports a flat hierarchy (though the stored extended key pair does not need to be a root node). The getPublicKey and sign methods work on the sub keys m/i, where m is the stored extended key pair and i is the index used in the methods. It is thus possible to get public keys and sign data using private keys from the sub keys known as m/0...n where n is a 32 bit integer. Private key derivation is supported, by setting the first (sign-) bit of index, as per the BIP 32 specification.

    Example: YkneoBitcoin neo = ... byte[] extendedPrivateMasterKey m = ... neo.importExtendedKeyPair(m, false).get(); //neo now holds the master key pair m.

    neo.getPublicKey(0); //This returns the uncompressed public key from sub key m/0 int index = 4711; index |= 0x80000000 neo.sign(index, hash); //This returns the signature of hash signed by m/4711'

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] exportExtendedPublicKey()
      Exports the stored extended public key which can be used for the creation of read-only wallets.
      byte[] generateMasterKeyPair(boolean allowExport, boolean returnPrivateKey, boolean testnetKey)
      Generates a new master key pair randomly, overwriting any existing key pair stored on the device.
      byte[] getAppletVersion()
      Gets the version of the ykneo-bitcoin applet that is loaded on the YubiKey NEO as a 3 byte array.
      byte[] getHeader()
      Gets the 13 byte BIP 32 key header for the stored extended private key.
      byte[] getPublicKey(boolean compress, int... index)
      Gets the public key obtained by deriving a sub key from the master key pair using the given index.
      void importExtendedKeyPair(byte[] extendedPrivateKey, boolean allowExport)
      Imports a new extended key pair, overwriting any existing key pair stored on the device.
      boolean isAdminUnlocked()
      Check to see if admin mode is unlocked.

      Check to see if user mode is unlocked.

      Re-sets and unblocks the user PIN.

    • Method Detail

      • getAppletVersion

        byte[] getAppletVersion()
        Gets the version of the ykneo-bitcoin applet that is loaded on the YubiKey NEO as a 3 byte array. The contained bytes represent the major, minor and micro versions of the applet.
        Returns:
        The ykneo-bitcoin applet version.

      • unlockUser

        void unlockUser(String pin)
                throws IncorrectPINException,
                       IOException
        Unlocks user mode of operation. If the incorrect PIN is given too many times, the mode will be locked.
        Parameters:
        pin - The PIN code to unlock user mode.
        Throws:
        IncorrectPINException
        IOException

      • unlockAdmin

        void unlockAdmin(String pin)
                 throws IncorrectPINException,
                        IOException
        Unlocks admin mode of operation. If the incorrect PIN is given too many times, the mode will be locked.
        Parameters:
        pin - The PIN code to unlock admin mode.
        Throws:
        IncorrectPINException
        IOException

      • isUserUnlocked

        boolean isUserUnlocked()
        Check to see if user mode is unlocked.
        Returns:
        True if user mode is unlocked, false if not.

      • isAdminUnlocked

        boolean isAdminUnlocked()
        Check to see if admin mode is unlocked.
        Returns:
        True if admin mode is unlocked, false if not.

      • setUserPin

        void setUserPin(String oldPin,
              String newPin)
                throws IncorrectPINException,
                       IOException
        Changes the user PIN. Does not require user mode to be unlocked. After successfully setting the PIN, the mode will be locked.
        Parameters:
        oldPin - The current user PIN.
        newPin - The new user PIN to set.
        Throws:
        IncorrectPINException
        IOException

      • setAdminPin

        void setAdminPin(String oldPin,
               String newPin)
                 throws IncorrectPINException,
                        IOException
        Changes the admin PIN. Does not require admin mode to be unlocked. After successfully setting the PIN, the mode will be locked.
        Parameters:
        oldPin - The current admin PIN,
        newPin - The new admin PIN to set.
        Throws:
        IncorrectPINException
        IOException

      • resetUserPin

        void resetUserPin(String newPin)
                  throws PinModeLockedException,
                         IOException
        Re-sets and unblocks the user PIN. Can be used if the user PIN is lost. Requires admin mode to be unlocked.
        Parameters:
        newPin - The new user PIN to set.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        IOException

      • getHeader

        byte[] getHeader()
                 throws PinModeLockedException,
                        IOException,
                        NoKeyLoadedException
        Gets the 13 byte BIP 32 key header for the stored extended private key.
        Returns:
        version(4) | depth(4) | parents fingerprint(4) | child number(4)
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        IOException
        NoKeyLoadedException

      • getPublicKey

        byte[] getPublicKey(boolean compress,
                  int... index)
                    throws PinModeLockedException,
                           UnusableIndexException,
                           IOException,
                           NoKeyLoadedException
        Gets the public key obtained by deriving a sub key from the master key pair using the given index. Requires user mode to be unlocked.
        Parameters:
        compress - True to return a compressed public key, false to return the uncompressed public key.
        index - The index of the derived sub key to get.
        Returns:
        A 65 (uncompressed) or 33 (compressed) byte public key.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        UnusableIndexException
        IOException
        NoKeyLoadedException

      • sign

        byte[] sign(byte[] hash,
          int... index)
            throws PinModeLockedException,
                   UnusableIndexException,
                   IOException,
                   NoKeyLoadedException
        Signs the given hash using the private key obtained by deriving a sub key from the master key pair using the given index. Requires user mode to be unlocked.
        Parameters:
        hash - The 32 byte hash to sign.
        index - The index of the derived sub key to sign with.
        Returns:
        A digital signature.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        UnusableIndexException
        IOException
        NoKeyLoadedException

      • generateMasterKeyPair

        byte[] generateMasterKeyPair(boolean allowExport,
                           boolean returnPrivateKey,
                           boolean testnetKey)
                             throws PinModeLockedException,
                                    IOException
        Generates a new master key pair randomly, overwriting any existing key pair stored on the device. The allowExport flag determines if the extended public key can later be exported or not. The returnPrivateKey flag determines if the generated key should be returned from the device (for backup purposes) or not. Requires admin mode to be unlocked.
        Parameters:
        allowExport - Sets the allowExport flag permitting the extended public key to be exported.
        returnPrivateKey - When true, the generated extended private key is returned, when false, an empty byte[] is returned.
        testnetKey - When true, the generated key will be for testnet use.
        Returns:
        A BIP 32 formatted extended private key, if returnPrivateKey is set.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        IOException

      • importExtendedKeyPair

        void importExtendedKeyPair(byte[] extendedPrivateKey,
                         boolean allowExport)
                           throws PinModeLockedException,
                                  IOException
        Imports a new extended key pair, overwriting any existing key pair stored on the device. The allowExport flag determines if the extended public key can later be exported or not. Requires admin mode to be unlocked.
        Parameters:
        extendedPrivateKey - A BIP 32 formatted extended private key to be imported.
        allowExport - Sets the allowExport flag permitting the extended public key to be exported.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        IOException

      • exportExtendedPublicKey

        byte[] exportExtendedPublicKey()
                               throws PinModeLockedException,
                                      IOException,
                                      OperationNotPermittedException,
                                      NoKeyLoadedException
        Exports the stored extended public key which can be used for the creation of read-only wallets. Unless the allowExport flag was set when the key was generated or imported, this method will fail. Requires admin mode to be unlocked.
        Returns:
        A BIP 32 formatted extended public key.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        IOException
        OperationNotPermittedException
        NoKeyLoadedException
